text: was a series of Nintendo GameCube games re-released for the Nintendo Wii. They were remade with Wii controls, and a 16:9 aspect ratio (instead of 4:3). Only 6 New Play Control games were released (7 in Japan). ==Games== * Chibi-Robo! - Japan only Play on Wii Selection * Donkey Kong Jungle Beat * Mario Power Tennis * Metroid Prime * Metroid Prime 2: Echoes * Pikmin * Pikmin 2 Note: Metroid Prime and Metroid Prime 2 were not available by themselves outside of Japan. ==References== Category:Wii
title: New Play Control!
